bibl.title: Three Papyri from Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.note: Egypt Exploration Society: 1. An apprenticeship contract. Early third century; - 2. An oath of guard. 218-222; - 3. A lease of land. 16 October 108 [1 = P. Oxy. XXXVIII, 2875; - 2 = P. Oxy. XXXVIII, 2876; - 3 = P. Oxy. XXXVIII, 2874].
bibl.seg: Bagnall Roger S., Three Papyri from Oxyrhynchus.

Egypt Exploration Society: 1. An apprenticeship contract. Early third century; - 2. An oath of guard. 218-222; - 3. A lease of land. 16 October 108 [1 = P. Oxy. XXXVIII, 2875; - 2 = P. Oxy. XXXVIII, 2876; - 3 = P. Oxy. XXXVIII, 2874].
